Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 104-76.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 99.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of three hyrdroelectric projects in the State of Arkansas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon request of a certain licensee, to extend for up to three consecutive two-year periods the time required for commencement of construction of three specified hydroelectric projects in Arkansas.

titles.title: A bill to extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of three hyrdroelectric projects in the State of Arkansas.
